related_questions.question: How to leave O2 with PAC code?
related_questions.snippet: If you're switching to another mobile network and you want to take your O2 number with you, you'll need to request a PAC (Porting Authorisation Code). To get your code, just text PAC to 65075. You'll receive it within 60 seconds.
related_questions.title: Leaving O2: What you need to know

related_questions.question: How do I submit a PAC code?
related_questions.title: Here's a step-by-step guide on how to move your current phone number to a new phone.
list: Text your current provider to request a mobile PAC code. ...
Contact your new network and give them the PAC code. ...
Check the SIM works in your phone and the new number has ported across.

related_questions.question: How to use PAC code from O2 to id mobile?
related_questions.snippet: Switching is as easy as 1-2-3. Using your SIM from your previous network, text PAC to 65075. This PAC will be valid for 30 days.
